message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $200?
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $150?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I've already sold this product to someone else for $200, and I'm not sure I can go any lower than $180. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $180?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $180 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $160?
I can see you're really interested in the product, but I've got to make a profit. I can do $170, but that's as low as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me at $170?
I'm really close to walking away, but I still think this product could be a great fit for me. Would you be willing to meet me at $165?

I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob. I can see you're willing to meet me halfway, but I've got to make a bit more than that. I can do $172, but that's my final offer. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I'm getting close to walking away, but I'm still willing to make one more attempt to reach a deal. Would you be willing to meet me at $167?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I've already made a few concessions. I'm willing to meet you at $169, but that's as low as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I'm still not sure I'm willing to meet you at $169. I've got a budget of $100, and I'm not comfortable going over that. Would you be willing to meet me at $100?
